name: Synthesia
description: AI video generation platform to create professional videos with AI avatars and voiceovers.

name: Runway Gen-2
description: Generate novel videos from text prompts or existing images. Text-to-video and image-to-video.

name: Pictory AI
description: AI video creation software that turns long-form content (scripts, articles) into short videos.

name: InVideo AI
description: Online video editor with AI-powered tools for quick video creation from text or templates.

name: Lumen5
description: AI-powered video creation platform that transforms blog posts and articles into videos.

name: HeyGen
description: AI video platform for creating engaging videos with customizable avatars and voice cloning.

name: VEED.IO
description: Online video editing suite with AI tools like auto-subtitling, transcription, and more.

name: Elai.io
description: Generate AI videos from just text. Create narrated videos with AI presenters.

name: Kaiber AI
description: AI video generation tool for creating artistic and animated videos from images or text.

name: D-ID
description: Platform to create videos with talking AI avatars from a single image and text.
